data.title: Ancient Crete Dances
data.meta_description: Ancient Crete Dances.pptx - Free download as Powerpoint Presentation (.ppt / .pptx), PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or view presentation slides online. Ancient dances originated in Crete according to Greek mythology. Dance was an integral part of daily life and intertwined with religion, myths, and symbols. Various dances were performed by Cretan men and women for different purposes like military training, healing, rituals, and entertainment. Circle, labyrinth, snake, harvest, acrobatic, and bull dances were some of the main dance types practiced in ancient Crete along with other traditional dances like Pentozali, Maleviziotis, Siganos, Ksenompasaris, and Sousta.
